name: Dirfuzz
tagline: Directory discovery and info gathering of web applications.
body:
## Welcome to the Dirfuzz website.

Features:  

* Enumerate unlinked ("hidden") directories and files.
* Identify redirects and directory indexes.
* Crawl a site to extract links and email address.
* Multi-threaded

### Basic usage
  
**Basic fuzz**  

```
$ ./dirfuzz host
```

**Getting help** 

```
$ ./dirfuzz -h
```

**Using a different base path** 

```
$ ./dirfuzz host -p /path
```

### Requirements

Ruby 1.9 or newer with the following gems installed:  
(to install a gem use: `gem install gem_name`)  

* term-ansicolor
* nokogiri
* work_queue

If you are using windows you will need ANSICON http://adoxa.3eeweb.com/ansicon/ to be able to see the colored output.

### Screenshot

![Dirfuzz 1.4](http://blackbytes.files.wordpress.com/2012/02/tool.jpg?w=590&h=256)

### Support or Contact

Having trouble with Dirfuzz? You can contact me at matugm@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll happy to help you out. You should also check out my blog, here is [one post](http://www.blackbytes.info/2015/12/ruby-time/) to get you started.
